main_definition: To hold or include something within limits, bounds, or space.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Restricted in size or extent; limited or confined.
meanings_and_examples.example: The small garden was contained within the walls of the house.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Held or enclosed, typically in a particular space.
meanings_and_examples.example: The book contains fascinating stories about ancient civilizations.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To have (something) as part of something larger; to include within scope or range.
meanings_and_examples.example: The package contained all the necessary items for the camping trip.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Expressing that a situation, feeling, etc. is being held back or controlled in some way.
meanings_and_examples.example: He felt contained by his own doubts and fears, unable to express himself fully.
